description: Relationship of respondent to HH Head
A1. Are you a native of this village?
A3. If No to Question 1, How many year have spent in this village?
A4. When was the household started? (year)
A5. In which year did the household start farming?
A7. Are you a member of a farmer group or association?
A8. In how many group/association are you a member?
A9. For how long have you been a member? (years)
A10. Have you participated in any agricultural or NRM related collective action during the last 12 months?
